definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Each branch is independent with regard to finance and accounting.
sentences.chinese: 在財務上和帳務上每個分公司都是獨立的。

sentences.english: If any debt becomes overdue, inform the branch head immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如遇應收賬款逾期未到帳，立即告知知分公司總經理。

sentences.english: I come from a remaining Shan branch, ant team, young tiger young tiger set.
sentences.chinese: 我來自餘珊分公司，螞蟻團隊，彪彪組。

sentences.english: I work for a branch in Xiamen of a multi-national company.
sentences.chinese: 我在一個跨國公司的廈門分公司工作。

sentences.english: We launched Freshness in 2005 in MediaCom's U.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，我們在英國分公司開始試行這項計劃。

sentences.english: Your letter of 9"September addressed to our Beijing Branch Office has been passed on to us for attention."
sentences.chinese: 貴方9月9日寫給我北京分公司的信已送往我處並閱。

sentences.english: Inom sorry. Mr. Scott was transferred to our diverge office.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，史考特老師曾經轉調到分公司。

sentences.english: The Fawer Fastener Subcompany is located in Jilin City, Jilin Province.
sentences.chinese: 富奧緊固件分公司位於吉林省吉林市。

sentences.english: Transport them to Lianyungang Branch, and take the general installation and final inspection there.
sentences.chinese: 最終運往連雲港分公司進行總體裝配和最終驗收。

sentences.english: Herve, a European-division chief is touring Linda's division.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲分公司的主管賀福正在巡視琳達的部門。

sentences.english: Introduced are current status and requirements of cementing job quality control in Changqing Oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了長慶油田分公司的固井質量管理和技術現狀。

sentences.english: The agency recently opened a Zag office in New York.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前，Zag在紐約的分公司也開業了。

sentences.english: Yesterday, Hanting Hotels in Beijing announced the establishment of the North Branch.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，漢庭酒店集團在京宣佈成立北方分公司。

sentences.english: Professional service staff handling more than 200 people, with the regional branch.
sentences.chinese: 專業搬運服務人員200餘人，各區域均設有分公司。

sentences.english: He was demoted and was transferred from Taipei branch to Kaohsiung branch.
sentences.chinese: 他被降職並從臺北分公司調職到高雄分公司。

sentences.english: He was demoted and was transferred from Taipei branch to Kaohsiung branch.
sentences.chinese: 他被降職並從臺北分公司調職到高雄分公司。

pinyin: gu3 fen4 you3 xian4 gong1 si1

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
